thread.title: A Rising Chef’s Rules for the Road
thread.title_full: A Rising Chef’s Rules for the Road - WSJ

author: Eric Steinman
title: A Rising Chef’s Rules for the Road
text:
Before Michael Solomonov traveled the world as a celebrated chef and cookbook author, he had to go down some darker roads by himself.
While born in Israel, Mr. Solomonov, 37, moved to the U.S. at the age of 3 and spent his formative years in Pittsburgh. He returned to Israel to live after dropping out of the University of Vermont.
In 2003, his younger brother David was killed by sniper fire while in his last days of service...
